description.lang: 2 channel Dimmer - 503 BOX - ZWave. Smart Switch IITwo buttons Smart Glass Switch Switch Device for Modbus Systemwith two switches for lighting control or alternatively, sequential pre-programmed settingsConfigurable aural feedback Available in British Standard & European Standard;Dimensions:BS 95x95mm; EU 125x95mm; On/Off by "One Touch"Dimming is by the "iPod -like" touch controlCapacitive technology to adjust lighting level
